# VZMacAuxiliaryStorage.InitializationOptions

**Structure**

Options you can set when creating new auxiliary storage.

## Declaration

```swift
struct InitializationOptions
```

## Mac auxiliary storage structure

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a new initialization options structure with the value you supply.

## Controlling overwrites

- **allowOverwrite**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the VM can overwrite an existing auxiliary storage file.
- **allowOverwrite**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the VM can overwrite an existing auxiliary storage file.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
